lead_paragraph: Washington Plaza, a 190-unit Art Deco complex in Jackson Heights, Queens, retained the original details and grandeur of its apartments.

headline.print_headline: A Makeover That Aims to Preserve
headline.main: A Jackson Heights Co-op That Aims to Preserve

snippet: Washington Plaza, a 190-unit Art Deco complex in Jackson Heights, Queens, retained the original details and grandeur of its apartments.
abstract: Delta Management is selling co-ops at Washington Plaza, former rent-regulated apartment complex in Jackson Heights, Queens; Freyer Collaborative Architects renovations of Art Deco buildings preserve their spaciousness and grandeur but have offer updates appealing to contemporary buyers; over half of first 23 units for sale are in contract and prices are expected to increase.
